text: Muhammad Ramzan Chhipa, is a humanitarian and a social worker from Karachi, Pakistan. He is the founder of Chhipa Welfare Association.http://tribune.com.pk/story/421848/recognising-excellence-manto- among-192-recipients-of-top-civil-awards/, Ramzan Chhipa's Sitara-e-Imtiaz Award (2013) info, Retrieved 25 March 2016 == References == Category:Humanitarians Category:Asian philanthropists Category:People from Karachi Category:1971 births Category:Living people
title: Ramzan Chhipa
